The zeroth impression

Landing pages grab attention, but the idea is to take it a step further. Imagine an engaging pre-loader animation that plays before the landing page itself, a "zeroth impression" before the first impression to hook users instantly. It's like array indexing, which starts at zero, not one. This highlights the importance of what happens even before the beginning. Computers use the index to find elements in an array, so starting at zero avoids an unnecessary calculation every time. The idea is to translate that logic to web design. By captivating users with a pre-loader animation before the main content loads, you create a more immersive web experience from the very "zeroth" moment.

Hence, this ai based saas platform [ coming soon ] helps you build the zeroth impression with a bunch of user-friendly, attention grabbing and optmiised pre-loading animations for your projects, stay tuned.
